```{r libraries}

# data
library(peopleanalyticsdata)

# data manipulation
library(tidyverse)

# modelling
library(tidymodels)
library(tidyclust)


data("managers", package = "peopleanalyticsdata")


managers %>% 
    tibble::as_tibble() %>% 
    dplyr::mutate(employee_id = as.character(employee_id)) %>% 
    tibble::column_to_rownames(employee_id)

rownames(managers) <- managers$employee_id
    select(-employee_id)

managers_df <- managers %>% 
    dplyr::select(-employee_id)

```


```{r}

managers_rec <- recipe(~ ., data = managers_df) %>% 
    #update_role(employee_id, new_role = "id") %>% 
    step_dummy(all_nominal_predictors()) %>% 
    step_zv(all_predictors()) %>% 
    step_normalize(all_numeric_predictors()) %>% 
    step_pca(all_numeric_predictors(), threshold = 0.8)

managers_rec

```

```{r}

kmeans_spec <- k_means(num_clusters = tune()) %>% 
    set_engine("ClusterR")

kmeans_spec

```

```{r}

kmeans_wf <- workflow(
    managers_rec,
    kmeans_spec
)

kmeans_wf

```

```{r}

clust_num_grid <- grid_regular(num_clusters(),
                               levels = 10) # currently cannot tune for more than 10 clusters

```



```{r}

set.seed(519)
manager_bootstraps <- bootstraps(managers, times = 25)

tune_res <- tune_cluster(
    kmeans_wf,
    resamples = manager_bootstraps,
    grid = clust_num_grid,
    control = control_grid(save_pred = TRUE, extract = identity),
    metrics = cluster_metric_set(sse_within_total, sse_total, sse_ratio)
)

tune_res

```


```{r}

collect_metrics(tune_res)
num_clusters <- select_best(tune_res) %>% pull(num_clusters)



final_kmeans_spec <- k_means(num_clusters = num_clusters) %>%
  set_engine("ClusterR")

final_kmeans_wf <- workflow(managers_rec, final_kmeans_spec)
final_kmeans_fit <- fit(final_kmeans_wf, data = managers)


personas_tbl <- 
    managers_tbl %>% 
    bind_cols(extract_cluster_assignment(final_kmeans_fit))
    

cluster_assignment_tbl <- extract_cluster_assignment(final_kmeans_fit)
persona_coordinates <- bake((managers_rec %>% prep()), new_data = NULL) 




```

```{r}


library(Rtsne)

tsne_obj <- Rtsne::Rtsne(persona_coordinates_tbl)


managers_tbl %>% glimpse()

managers_tbl <- managers_tbl %>% 
    mutate(
        description = stringr::str_glue("Performance Group: {performance_group}
                                        Tenure: {yrs_employed} years
                                        Test Score: {test_score}")
        
        )




tsne_tbl <- tsne_obj$Y %>% 
    tibble::as_tibble() %>% 
    dplyr::rename("X" = V1, "Y" = V2) %>% 
    dplyr::bind_cols(managers_tbl) %>% 
    dplyr::bind_cols(cluster_assignment_tbl)

tsne_tbl %>% glimpse()


g <- tsne_tbl %>%
    ggplot2::ggplot(aes(x = X, y = Y, colour = .cluster, text = description)) +
    geom_point()


plotly::ggplotly(g, tooltip = "text")

```
